meanings.definition: A person who posts something, especially on social media.
meanings.sent1: The posters on Instagram share photos of their pets.
meanings.sent2: I saw many posters on Twitter discussing the latest news.
meanings.sent3: The posters on Facebook were busy sharing funny memes.
meanings.sent4: She was like a diligent poster, always updating her social media.
meanings.sent5: The posters in the online community were very active and engaging.

meanings.definition: A large printed picture or notice put up in a public place.
meanings.sent1: The posters on the wall advertised the upcoming concert.
meanings.sent2: I like to decorate my room with colorful posters of my favorite bands.
meanings.sent3: The posters on the bulletin board were all about lost pets.
meanings.sent4: The posters in the subway station caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The posters in the classroom helped students remember important information.

meanings.definition: A person who is responsible for delivering mail.
meanings.sent1: The posters at the post office work hard to deliver packages on time.
meanings.sent2: I thanked the posters for bringing my letters despite the bad weather.
meanings.sent3: The posters were racing against time to deliver all the parcels.
meanings.sent4: The posters moved swiftly through the neighborhood, delivering letters with care.
meanings.sent5: The posters' dedication ensured that everyone received their mail promptly.
